description: A man in his 40s is killed in the crash near Northampton.
title: Van driver dies in Flore bypass crash
title_page: Van driver dies in Flore bypass crash - BBC News
maintext:
A man in his 40s has died after a van and a car crashed near Northampton.
Police are seeking witnesses to the crash, which happened on the A4500 Flore bypass at about 12:30 GMT on Wednesday.
The driver of a white Mercedes Sprinter van collided with a white Mercedes X-Class and died at the scene, police said.
Detectives would like to hear from anyone who saw the collision or may have dash-cam footage that could help their investigation.
